name: Naughty or Nice (itch)
description:
Naughty Or Nice - A Jingle Jam 2019 entry

You are an elf. Letters are still coming in and santa needs to leave soon! Build the items they want, wrap them up and send them on their way... unless they aren't good. If they are bad, throw their brand new present into the furnace and give the remains to them; That's what they deserve. The only problem is Santa is quite indecisive about what actions are naughty and what aren't, so keep an eye out.
